metadata.title: MM's Big Face Ceramic Mugs (Green) m&m m & m
features: A full 19oz. size of mug awaits your drinking pleasure!
As a surprise, there is a different fun message written on the inside lip of each mug.
Each mug color has its own saying.
On the back of each mug is the characters' name stenciled also. Dishwasher safe
